situation_summary: Cash flow is unpredictable; need better visibility and a reserve policy before seeking growth finance.
decision_statement: Implement a 13-week rolling cash flow forecast and a 90-day minimum reserve policy by end of Q2.
constraints: No new hires for finance; must use existing tools where possible.
assumptions: Revenue from current contracts remains stable; one major customer payment may slip by 2 weeks.

situation_summary: Production bottlenecks and inconsistent lead times are affecting customer commitments.
decision_statement: Introduce a simple capacity and lead-time dashboard and weekly planning review by end of Q1.
constraints: Budget under Â£5k for tooling; no ERP change this year.
assumptions: Shop-floor can dedicate 2 hours/week to data capture; current spreadsheets can be standardized.

situation_summary: Lead quality is mixed; need to align messaging and track which channels drive qualified pipeline.
decision_statement: Define a single ICP and attribution model, and run one focused campaign per quarter with clear success metrics.
constraints: Marketing spend capped at current level; must work with existing CRM.
assumptions: Sales will provide feedback on lead quality within 48 hours; one primary channel will emerge as best fit.

situation_summary: Tool sprawl and manual handoffs between dev and delivery are slowing releases.
decision_statement: Consolidate to one primary project/task tool and one CI/CD pipeline, with a lightweight release checklist, by end of Q2.
constraints: No big migration; prefer improving current stack. One dedicated tech lead for the change.
assumptions: Team agrees on primary tool; existing integrations can be reused.

situation_summary: Pipeline exists but conversion is inconsistent. Messaging is broad and inbound leads are not the right fit.
decision_statement: Narrow ICP to one primary segment and run a single focused outbound motion for 45 days with clear qualification criteria.
constraints: No increase in ad spend; founder-led sales must fit within 10 hours per week.
assumptions: At least one segment will show repeatable pain signals; existing case studies can be reframed to match the ICP.

situation_summary: Activation is weak; users sign up but do not reach the first value moment quickly.
decision_statement: Redesign onboarding to achieve a first-value moment within 10 minutes and improve week-1 activation by 20% within 45 days.
constraints: No major rebuild; changes must be incremental and measurable; only one engineer available.
assumptions: The activation drop happens before the first key action; small UX fixes and clearer prompts can shift behavior.
